title: The Ayakashi King's Bride
alternative_title: Ayakashiou no Hanayome  ,Ayakashi-ou no Hanayome,Monster King's Flower Bride,The Ayakashi King and His Blossoming Bride,The King of the Dangerous Spirits and His Young Wife,The Spirit Monarch's Bride,The Wicked King's Bride,Невеста короля аякаши,ملك الأرواح و عروسه الفتية,妖王の花嫁,Bride of the Bewitching Kin
status: Ayakashiou no Hanayome  ,Ayakashi-ou no Hanayome,Monster King's Flower Bride,The Ayakashi King and His Blossoming Bride,The King of the Dangerous Spirits and His Young Wife,The Spirit Monarch's Bride,The Wicked King's Bride,Невеста короля аякаши,ملك الأرواح و عروسه الفتية,妖王の花嫁,Bride of the Bewitching Kin
description:
Description :
        After losing her home and her father, 16-year-old Saki turns to her father’s best friend Oboro. However, his house is an Ayakashi mansion, and suddenly she is welcomed as the Ayakashi King’s bride! Then, just as Saki was thinking that his face is her type, Oboro seals her fate by proposing to her?!

Includes an extra story “Oboro and the Bride— the First Meeting“, a must-read!
